  • Class
    Description
    Connection
    Represents a connection between a client and a server.
    MessageHandler
    Handles incoming messages and invokes the appropriate methods in the controller based on the message type.
    MessageHeader
    The MessageHeader enum represents the headers for different types of messages.
    ReconnectType
     
    SocketMap
    This class represents a mapping between connections and their corresponding identifiers.
    TCPMessage
    This class represents a TCP message containing a header and a body.
    TCPServer
    This class represents a TCP server that listens for incoming client connections.
